View on GitHub

pyref.dev

A fast, convenient way to access Python reference docs.

87 packages
68,314 symbols

Quickly jump to the official documentation for Python standard library modules and popular packages by using a simple URL pattern:

pyref.dev/<fully.qualified.symbol.name>

Examples

  • pyref.dev/json
  • pyref.dev/pathlib.Path
  • pyref.dev/datetime.datetime.strftime
  • pyref.dev/numpy.array
